verbose_text: Since neurons in the diseased brain were more sensitive to the effects of IL-1 and failed to recover their resting membrane potential, we hypothesised that the previously reported neuronal apoptosis induced by systemic LPS [XREF_BIBR] would be mediated by IL-1RI.
evidence: apoptosis induced by systemic LPS [ XREF_BIBR ] would be mediated by IL-1RI
